snippet: The media company’s revenues surpassed Wall Street expectations, but profits were down in part because of the cost of starting two new channels.
abstract: 21st Century Fox reports third-quarter profit of $768 million, or 33 cents a share; revenue was $7.06 billion, from $6 billion year ago.
lead_paragraph: The media company’s revenues surpassed Wall Street expectations, but profits were down in part because of the cost of starting two new channels.

headline.main: Profits at 21st Century Fox Hampered by TV Investments
headline.print_headline: Profits at 21st Century Fox Hampered by TV Investments
